trans-unit.note: Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.

trans-unit.source: 开发者: Little Fish 团队

trans-unit.note: Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.

trans-unit.source: DES（Data Encryption Standard）：对称算法，数据加密标准，速度较快，适用于加密大量数据的场合；
trans-unit.target: DES (Data Standard Encryption): Symmetry algorithm, data encryption standard, faster, suitable for encrypting large amounts of data;

trans-unit.source: 3DES（Triple DES）：是基于DES的对称算法，对一块数据用三个不同的密钥进行三次加密，强度更高；
trans-unit.target: DES (Data Standard Encryption): Symmetry algorithm, data encryption standard, faster, suitable for encrypting large amounts of data; ...

trans-unit.source: RC2和RC4：对称算法，用变长密钥对大量数据进行加密，比 DES 快；
trans-unit.target: RC2 and RC4: Symmetry algorithm, which encrypts large amounts of data with a long key, faster than DES;

trans-unit.source: AES（Advanced Encryption Standard）：高级加密标准，对称算法，是下一代的加密算法标准，速度快，安全级别高，在21世纪AES 标准的一个实现是 Rijndael 算法；
trans-unit.target: Advanced Encryption: Advanced encryption standard, symmetric algorithm, is the next generation of encryption algorithm standard, fast, high security level, in the 21st century AES standard one implementation is the Rijndael algorithm;

trans-unit.source: 注意：推荐使用AES 192位进行加密，安全高效。由于技术限制全部使用电子密码本（ECB）模式，可能会降低安全性能，机密文件请使用Win32的加密软件。敬请期待后续更新。
trans-unit.target: Note: It is recommended to use AES 192 bits for encryption, which is safe and efficient. Due to technical restrictions on the full use of the Electronic Cipher Book (ECB) mode, which may degrade security performance, confidential files are used using Win32's encryption software. Stay tuned for follow-up updates.

trans-unit.source: 概念：这里的密码并不会影响文件整体的加密情况，也就是说无论密码是什么，加密后的文件本质都是一样的。因此密码只在这个应用内部作为验证身份的功能而不能保护文件，要想保护文件请修改密匙。
trans-unit.target: Concept: The password here does not affect the overall encryption of the file, that is, no matter what the password is, the encrypted file is essentially the same. So the password is only inside this app as a function of identity verification and cannot protect the file, to protect the file please modify the key。

trans-unit.source: 设置密码：（1）输入密码（2）单击使用（3）再次输入密码（4）单机确认（5）设置成功（6）提示密码错误后可以重新输入，提示三次后可以重新设置密码，注意观察密码输入框上方文字
trans-unit.target: Concept: The password here does not affect the overall encryption of the file, that is, no matter what the password is, the encrypted file is essentially the same. So the password is only inside this app as a function of identity verification and cannot protect the file, to protect the file please modify the key ...

trans-unit.source: 注意：存储密码时会使用一样的加密算法和密匙加密，也就是说提示密码错误的时候可能是 解密算法或解密密匙错误。密码长度没有限制，也可以不输入。
trans-unit.target: Note: Passwords are stored with the same encryption algorithm and key encryption, meaning that a password error may be a decryption algorithm or a key error. There is no limit to the length of the password, and you can't enter it.

trans-unit.source: 概念：密匙就是属于加密算法的一个密码，其他人必须通过输入这个密匙并使用匹配的解密算法才能解密文件。因为密匙是加密算法的一部分，所以采用何种加密算法决定了密匙的最大长度
trans-unit.target: Concept: A key is a password that belongs to an encryption algorithm, and others must enter the key and use a matching decryption algorithm to decrypt the file. Because the key is part of the encryption algorithm, which encryption algorithm is used determines the maximum length of the key

trans-unit.source: 加密文本后的密文会以类似于##1A2##的开头，请确保全部复制，少了任何一个字符都无法解密，出于安全考虑不讨论其详细的构造。
trans-unit.target: The encrypted text is encrypted with a #的开头 similar to the #1A2, making sure that all copies are copied, that no one character is decrypted, and that its detailed construction is not discussed for security reasons.

trans-unit.source: 1.可以加密的文件大小取决于你的计算机内存大小和体系架构，32位操作系统最高可加密400MB，64位操作系统可加密1GB以上；加密时所需内存大致是文件大小的3倍,如果文件太大会直接卡死，解决办法是强行重启；由于每台设备的性能不一样，我们并没有设置文件大小上限；为了正常解密请不要加密处于临界值大小的文件（测试机器性能：Intel(R)Core(TM)i5-5200U CPU@ 2.20GHz2.20GHz,RAM 8GB,Windows 10(x64)专业版 17763.253）
trans-unit.target: 1. The size of the files that can be encrypted depends on your computer memory size and architecture, 32-bit operating system can be encrypted up to 400MB, 64-bit operating system can encrypt more than 1GB; Because the performance of each device is different, we do not set the file size limit, in order to decrypt normally Do not encrypt files at critical value size (test machine performance: Intel (R)Core (TM)) I5-5200U CPU 2.20GHz 2.20GHz, RAM 8GB, Windows 10 (x64) Pro 17763.253)

trans-unit.source: 2.提醒文件被加密：加密后的文件后缀名会被修改为.lfjia ，解密后恢复正常。双击解密功能正在开发中
trans-unit.target: 2. Remind the file to be encrypted: the encrypted file suffix will be modified to .lfjia, decrypted and returned to normal. Double-click decryption is under development

trans-unit.source: 3.记录加密信息：加密文件中会记录加密算法和密匙，解密时尽管输入的是错误的算法或密匙，也会正常解密，但是密码输入错误后会中止解密。
trans-unit.target: 3. Record encrypted information: the encryption file will record the encryption algorithm and key, decrypting although the input of the wrong algorithm or key, will also be normal decryption, but the password input error will abort decryption.

trans-unit.source: 4.删除源文件：勾选后删除的文件不会出现在回收站中，请三思后启用
trans-unit.target: 4. Delete the source file: the deleted file after checking will not appear in the recycle bin, please think twice before enabling

trans-unit.source: 5.双重加密：此功能是为了回应（Jin Fan kingium@outlook.com）的质疑。1.4.12版本经过开发人员的大量测试，不存在替换加密密匙或密码的情况。现在引入这个功能更是否决了这个可能性。
trans-unit.target: 5. Dual encryption: This feature is in response to a query (Jin Fan kingium.outlook.com). Version 1.4.12 has been extensively tested by developers and there is no case for replacing an encryption key or password. The introduction of this feature now rejects this possibility.

trans-unit.source: 6.此应用调用UWP自带API，正在自研加密/解密C++库
trans-unit.target: 6. This app calls UWP's own API, which is self-researching the encryption/decrypting C library

trans-unit.source: 7.批量加密后的文件将会按照原文件夹顺序层次排放，但是会把保存到的文件夹默认作为第一层存放
trans-unit.target: 7. Bulk encrypted files will be discharged in the original folder order hierarchy, but the saved folder will be saved as the first layer by default

trans-unit.source: MD5和哈希算法以及对比文本
trans-unit.target: MD5 and hash algorithms and contrasting text

trans-unit.source: 加密/解密密匙：使用默认密匙加密可以免去你自己输入密匙这个步骤，但是会降低一部分安全性。为了防止文件被其他应用恶意解密，这次不再明文显示默认密匙。从前由于我们的疏忽没有考虑到技术人员恶意使用默认密匙攻击，深感抱歉。每一种加密算法所需要的密匙的位数都会给出，一般情况下将位数除以8就是你要输入的字符长度（我们不担保用中文的后果）比如：56位就要输入7个数字或字母（再比如：123F56A）（准确来说是十六进制数，F以后的字母尽可能不要输）。如果检测到密匙位数多于或少于给定位数，应用会从后向前截断或使用空字符补齐。
trans-unit.target: Encryption/decryption keys: Using the default key encryption eliminates the need to enter the key yourself, but reduces some security. To prevent files from being maliciously decrypted by other apps, the default key is no longer explicitly displayed this time. Previously, due to our negligence, we are sorry that we did not take into account the malicious use of the default key attack by a technician. The number of digits required for each encryption algorithm is given, and in general dividing the number of digits by 8 is the length of the character you want to enter (we do not guarantee the consequences of Chinese) for example: 56 bits will be entered with 7 numbers or letters (for example: 123F56A) (to be exact hexadecimal, F after the letter as far as possible do not lose). If more or less than a given number of keys is detected, the app truncates from the back or uses empty characters to complement them.

trans-unit.source: 概念：MD5即Message-Digest Algorithm 5（信息-摘要算法5），用于确保信息传输完整一致。是计算机广泛使用的杂凑算法之一（又译摘要算法、哈希算法），主流编程语言普遍已有MD5实现。将数据（如汉字）运算为另一固定长度值，是杂凑算法的基础原理，MD5的前身有MD2、MD3和MD4。MD5算法具有以下特点：
trans-unit.target: Concept: MD5, message-Algorithm 5 (information-summary algorithm 5), to ensure complete and consistent information transmission. It is one of the most widely used algorithms of computers (and translation summary algorithms, hash algorithms), and MD5 has been widely implemented in mainstream programming languages. The operation of data (such as Chinese characters) as another fixed-length value is the basic principle of the hybrid algorithm, which was preceded by MD2, MD3 and MD4. The MD5 algorithm has the following features:

trans-unit.source: 1.压缩性：任意长度的数据，算出的MD5值长度都是固定的。
trans-unit.target: 1. Compression: any length of data, calculated MD5 value length is fixed.

trans-unit.source: 2.容易计算：从原数据计算出MD5值很容易。
trans-unit.target: 2. Easy to calculate: It is easy to calculate the MD5 value from the original data.

trans-unit.source: 3.抗修改性：对原数据进行任何改动，哪怕只修改1个字节，所得到的MD5值都有很大区别。
trans-unit.target: 3. Anti-modification: any changes to the original data, even if only 1 byte, the resulting MD5 value is very different.

trans-unit.source: 4.强抗碰撞：已知原数据和其MD5值，想找到一个具有相同MD5值的数据（即伪造数据）是非常困难的。
trans-unit.target: 4. Strong collision: Known raw data and its MD5 value, it is very difficult to find a data with the same MD5 value (i.e. falsified data).

trans-unit.source: MD5的作用是让大容量信息在用数字签名软件签署私人密钥前被 压缩 成一种保密的格式（就是把一个任意长度的字节串变换成一定长的十六进制数字串）哈希算法依次类推。由于时间紧迫没有添加sha3算法，在此表达真挚的歉意.
trans-unit.target: The role of MD5 is to make large-capacity information compressed into a confidential format (i.e., converting a string of bytes of any length into a certain length of hexadecimal string) hash algorithm skewed it, before signing a private key with digital signature software. Due to the time constraints did not add the sha3 algorithm, here is a sincere apology to express.

trans-unit.source: 通俗解释：许多下载站会给出文件的sha值，只需要对比下载到的文件的sha值是否和给出的一致，就可以判断文件是否在下载过程中被损坏
trans-unit.target: Popular explanation: Many download sites will give the file's sha value, only need to compare the downloaded file's sha value is consistent with the given, you can determine whether the file is damaged during the download process

trans-unit.source: 对比文件：出于过低的使用频率和时间问题，暂时移除这一功能
trans-unit.target: Comparison files: Temporarily remove this feature due to low usage frequency and time issues

trans-unit.source: 由于微软的激进更新政策和开发团队有限的精力，现在已经无法编译1.3.711的代码工程，也无法运行1.3.6的本地安装包。但是我们在应用中内置了1.3.711版本的加密/解密页面 访问方式：帮助中心->存档
trans-unit.target: Due to Microsoft's aggressive update policy and limited effort on the part of the development team, it is no longer possible to compile the 1.3.711 code project or run the 1.3.6 local installation package. But we built 1.3.711 version of the encryption/decryption page in the app How to access it: Help Center - archive

trans-unit.source: 随机生成：它使用系统的随机数API生成随机密匙，考虑到后续更新我们使用AA开头
trans-unit.target: Random build: It uses the system's random number API to generate a secret key, taking into account subsequent updates we use AA at the beginning

trans-unit.source: 请尽快将所有加密的旧版本的文件转化成新格式的文件,我们只能在能力范围内维持对旧文件的支持。1.5.23版本为了向下兼容操作系统，文件编码由默认编码换成了UTF-8，极个别出现无法解密提示文件损坏的用户，请联系开发者获取1.5.21测试版
trans-unit.target: Please convert all encrypted old versions of files into new format files as soon as possible, and we can only maintain support for older files within our capabilities. 1.5.23 version In order to be down-compatible with the operating system, the file encoding was changed from the default code to UTF-8, very few users who could not decrypt the prompt file corruption, please contact the developer for 1.5.21 beta

trans-unit.source: 应用使用流畅设计体系，因此Windows 10 版本低于14399的用户会收到另一个安装包1.3.711，这两个安装包的版本不再一致。由于跨越六个大的系统更新，加之本团队能力有限请尽快更新至新版本系统（17763）
trans-unit.target: The app uses a smooth design system, so users with Windows 10 versions below 14399 receive another installation package 1.3.711, and the versions of the two installation packages no longer match. Due to six large system updates, coupled with the limited capacity of this team, please update to the new version of the system as soon as possible (17763)

trans-unit.source: 当前版本包含英语，日语，德语，法语，中文繁体，可以前往系统设置切换语言
trans-unit.target: The current version contains English, Japanese, German, French, traditional Chinese, you can go to the system Settings to switch languages

trans-unit.source: 对于Windows 10 Mobile用户，目前我们已经成功适配到周年更新版本（14399），请升级到最新系统
trans-unit.target: For Windows 10 Mobile users, we have now successfully adapted to the Anniversary Update (14399), please upgrade to the latest system

trans-unit.source: 我们确保对此应用进行了全面测试，但是不担保此应用在任何时候都运行正常，也不担保加密/解密结果的正确性。发生任何问题后请在第一时间联系我们，我们会做出能力范围内的修复和补偿。我们不对翻译的文字的准确性和完整性做出担保，即由于英文的提示说明使你误解并造成了一定损失，我们不承担任何责任
trans-unit.target: We ensure that this application is thoroughly tested, but do not guarantee that the application will function properly at all times, nor that the encryption/decryption results are correct. Please contact us in the first place after any problems occur and we will make repairs and compensation within our capabilities. We do not warrant the accuracy and completeness of the translated text, i.e. we are not responsible for any loss caused by the instructions in English that cause you to misunderstand and cause some damage.

trans-unit.source: 注意：同一个加密文本或文件的解密密匙和加密密匙是同一个！请牢记密匙，目前没有找回密匙的方法！
trans-unit.target: Note: The same encrypted text or file decryption key and encryption key are the same! Keep in mind the key, there is currently no way to retrieve it!

trans-unit.source: 我们推荐使用默认密匙并不是出于安全的考虑，而是担心你会忘记密匙从而丢失宝贵文件！！！
trans-unit.target: We recommend the default key not for security reasons, but for fear that you will forget the key and lose valuable files!!!

trans-unit.source: 加密算法（对称式加密技术）
概念：数据加密的基本过程就是对原来为明文的文件或数据按某种算法进行处理，使其成为不可读的一段代码，通常称为 密文 ，使其只能在输入相应的密钥之后才能显示出本来内容，通过这样的途径来达到保护数据不被非法人窃取、阅读的目的。 该过程的逆过程为解密，即将该编码信息转化为其原来数据的过程。
trans-unit.target: Concept: The basic process of data encryption is to process the original clear-text file or data according to some algorithm, making it unreadable a piece of code, often referred to as redaction, so that it can only be entered after the corresponding key can show the original content, through such a way to protect the data from illegal theft, reading purposes. The reverse process of the process is the process of decrypting, which converts the encoded information into its original data.

trans-unit.source: 通俗解释：这就像把你的文件放进一个抽屉并给它上锁，只有用对应的钥匙才能打开这个抽屉（解密），而其他人无法打开这个抽屉，除非通过暴力手段（尝试遍世界上的所有钥匙）
trans-unit.target: Popular explanation: It's like putting your file in a drawer and locking it, only with the corresponding key to open it (decrypted), and no one else can open it unless it's violent (try ingestalling all the keys in the world)

trans-unit.source: 这一部分还在开发中，功能十分简陋，还请各位用户以测试的心态去使用。我们计划明年更新磁力链接和种子文件下载功能，希望在这方面有所了解的大佬给我们一些指导，能加快我们的步伐。如果不想让应用进行联网操作，可以到系统设置里拒绝应用网络权限，感谢你的支持
trans-unit.target: This part is still under development, the function is very simple, please also use the user's mentality of testing. We plan to update the magnetic link and seed file download function next year. I hope that you can get some guidance in this area and speed up our pace. If you don't want the app to be networked, you can refuse to apply network permissions in the system settings. Thank you for your support.

trans-unit.target: Password error, please confirm and try again

trans-unit.source: 你没有添加任何一个文件或文件夹

trans-unit.source: 尝试读取文件版本失败
解密时出现问题，请确保解密密匙，解密模式，解密算法的正确性，核对后请重试。如果你看到过这个提示很多次，请在反馈中心把这个问题报告给我们，谢谢
trans-unit.target: There is a problem decrypting, please ensure that the decryption key, decryption mode, decrypttheor algorithm correctness, check again. If you've seen this tip many times, please report this question to us in the Feedback Center, thank you

trans-unit.source: 解密成功，点击下面的图片保存
trans-unit.target: Decryptsuccessful, click on the picture below to save

trans-unit.source: 请点击上面的图片选择要进行解密的文件
trans-unit.target: Please click on the picture above to select the file to decrypt

trans-unit.source: 保存结果时出现问题，请重试。若重试多次后依旧出现这条提示，请将此问题反馈给我们，我们会尽力解决，谢谢
trans-unit.target: There was a problem saving the results, please try again. If this prompt still appears after trying again many times, please feed us back to this issue and we will try our best to resolve it, thank you

trans-unit.source: 恭喜你，密匙长度已经达到要求的40个字符
trans-unit.target: Congratulations, the key length has reached the required 40 characters

trans-unit.source: 恭喜你，密匙长度已经达到要求的40个字符
trans-unit.target: Congratulations, the key length has reached the required 40 characters

trans-unit.source: 密匙长度必须是40，请核对密匙
trans-unit.target: The length of the key must be 40, please check the key

trans-unit.source: 密码过长，应在0~20字符之间
trans-unit.target: Password is too long, should be between 0 to 20 characters

trans-unit.source: 两次输入的密码不一致
设置密码时，请确保两次输入的密码一致，且长度小于60个字符
trans-unit.target: When setting a password, make sure that the password entered twice is the same and is less than 60 characters long

trans-unit.source: 加密时出现问题，请确保加密密匙，加密模式，加密算法的正确性，核对后请重试。如果你看到过这个提示很多次，请在反馈中心把这个问题报告给我们，谢谢
trans-unit.target: When there is a problem with encryption, please make sure that the encryption key, encryption mode, encryption algorithm is correct, check again. If you've seen this tip many times, please report this question to us in the Feedback Center, thank you

trans-unit.source: 加密成功，点击下面的图片保存
trans-unit.target: Encryption was successful, click on the picture below to save

trans-unit.source: 请点击上面的图片选择要进行加密的文件。
trans-unit.target: Please click on the image above to select the file to encrypt.

trans-unit.source: 应用内存不足无法解密大于（390MB）的文件，敬请期待后续更新
trans-unit.target: Application with out of memory cannot decrypt files larger than (390MB), stay tuned for subsequent updates

trans-unit.source: 密匙长度必须是40，请核对密匙
trans-unit.target: The length of the key must be 40, please check the key

trans-unit.source: 输入密码时，请确保两次输入的密码一致，且长度小于60个字符
trans-unit.target: When entering a password, make sure that the password is entered twice and is less than 60 characters long
Files that need to be encrypted/decrypted

trans-unit.source: 注意：若要给文件添加密码，请更改加密/解密模式为 普通模式 。由于密匙是40个0或1组成的，很容易看错，所以建议使用默认密匙。且在大部分情况下，加密/解密密匙和算法错误无法检测到，只有在使用文件时才会被你发现。部分被解密的文件的末尾存在多个/u008字符，我们大量的测试表明这不会影响使用，请放心。
trans-unit.target: Note: To add a password to a file, change the encryption/decryption mode to normal mode. Since the key is made up of 40 0s or 1s, it's easy to misread, so the default key is recommended. And in most cases, encryption/decryption keys and algorithmic errors cannot be detected and are only discovered by you when you are using files. There are multiple /u008 characters at the end of some of the decrypted files, and our extensive testing shows that this will not affect usage, please be assured.
